title: How to train with video: how to choose them and use them to fast-forward training in your organization
creator_credit: CareerTrack Publications and Matthew A Keller
brief_description: This program shows how video can be used in training. Topics such as what to look for in video training, what kinds of programs are available, the benefits of training using video and how to set up an overall video training program.
